thread.section_title: Plaza Opera Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location, very good value for money
thread.title_full: Great location, very good value for money - Review of Plaza Opera Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Angela B
title: Great location, very good value for money
text: It was a pleasant stay, I would choose it again defenately. There is a bus stop outside of the hotel, also in a walking distance of the Opera. The rooms are clean and suitable for short stay. The breakfast is average but defenately close to the price of the hotel.
